# Sphinx core + theme
sphinx~=7.0
furo~=2024.8

# Markdown support
myst-parser~=3.0

# Autogenerated API reference (no imports required)
sphinx-autoapi~=3.4

# Live-reloading during docs dev
sphinx-autobuild~=2024.10

# Extras for better UX
sphinx-copybutton~=0.5
sphinx-design~=0.6
sphinx-inline-tabs~=2023.4
